name: Unfit To Fly
description:
For hundreds of years, Earth has been abandoned. You lead the charge aboard an exploration ship, headed back to our home planet. On the way, though, a solar flare traps you in your quarters, and causes a glitch which makes your cybernetic monkey Steven the captain. The only way things could get worse: you're hurtling toward the Sun! The ship is controlled by the captain's voice, so in order to get out alive, you have to convince Steven to say certain key phrases to get the Navigation, Hyperdrive, and Engines online.

Will you connect with Steven via your shared Earth heritage, or will you be cooked alive?

Controls: Keyboard and Mouse

MOUSE to look around

WASD to move

ENTER opens chat and submits, to talk to Steven.

Check the computer by the window for a list of all the pass phrases. If Steven says a certain phrase out loud, it will activate that function of the ship. Steven can often be difficult to deal with, so stay on his good side!
